name: Not Alone (capitaomolho, Mizuru)
description:
Title: Not Alone
Platform: PC
Genre: Horror, Thriller
Release date: 27th June 2021

Summary:

After an alien invasion to the Centauri spaceship, the tripulation decided to evacuate and the main character got left behind. The player now needs to find a way to survive the situation alone with a limited number of weapons and ammo, the player will have to face some enemies being one of them almost impossible to defeat.

In order for the player to escape de spaceship he must turn on the power and find the coordinates to relocate the spaceship, after that, the player has 30 seconds to run to the escape pod and flee.

Keybinds: WMove Forward
AMove Left
SMove Back
DMove Right
EAction Button
FToggle Flashlight
RReload Weapon
SpaceJumpShift (Hold)
SprintCtrl (Hold)
CrouchEscPause Menu
Left Mouse (Click)
Shoot Poster:


Install Instructions:

To play the game download the game zip file and unzip the folder.
Then run the Not-Alone.exe.
